mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Kelley, Benjamin F.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: F.H. Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Gov Wheeling Oct 30 1861. By Telegraph from New Creek 30 1861. I have no guns here except such as we captured from the rebels they are old flint locks & not worth having we have about three hundred of them BF Kelley Brig Genl 29Rn92paid
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Kelley, Benjamin F.
New Creek, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
